name: FASTION
description:
FASTION is my first working game! 

FASTION is an endless runner in which you have to avoid obstacles and survive (somehow). Share in the comments your the best scores! Game is set under the water cause what not.

Every objects/models were created by the author, only music wasn't mine and because of that there is a link to the creator of the music I used in my game:                        

 Pixel Pig by Di Young

Creative Commons Attribution license
Free Download / Stream: https://bit.ly/di-young-pixel-pig
Music promoted by Audio Library
